text: Kamata Jisas naŋga nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ uta pɨhu aru Kaperneam yɨvurahata kɨyɨmu. Kamatɨhu Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ hañɨndurɨm vata kru tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋandu haŋɨnɨŋ payɨmu. Pata Pitaŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumu, Narɨŋandɨ ahusɨki ndama Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ nɨŋandɨhin mɨŋasɨrɨvasɨrɨvarɨm tɨmbahɨrɨs ŋguhi vaha, vamu.
